Joaquin Moine

Cordoba - Argentina · +54 3585-410712 · joaquinmoine@gmail.com

I have been working as a backend developer since 2015, I have worked in different kind of projects in different roles and technologies but mainly at python.

Experience

Senior Backend Engineer

Mercado Libre

Mercado Libre is an e-commerce and a virtual wallet. I have been working building an internal plataform to make easier the develop process of machine learning, from the experimientation stage to deliver machine learning models and ensure the quality of them.

Projects

Machine learning quality

Collecting inputs and predictions of productive machine learning models to analize behaviours and found anomalies. I had to deal with scalability because the backend receive around five handreed toushand inputs and predictions per minute also I took care about performance to generete as minimum impact over the prediction time as possible.

Fury Data Apps

It is the plataform where data science develop their machine learning models, the plataform has a set of features including Experimentation, ETL process, Trainig models, Storage of large dataset and models, Automate the execution of ETL and Training process, Workflows to make a flow of related ETLs and Trainings and Serving of Machine Learning Models.

Instructor of Bootcamp

I was instructor of two Bootcamps where I teach how to use Fury Data Apps plataform for new employees.

Rest Client Mock Library

I made an internal mock library in order to help with unit tests of projects which use an internal Rest Client library.

Constructive Culture Laboratory

Improve Constructive Culture Laboratory UI and add features, so teams measure the quality of their projects evaluating some project aspects such as testing, documentation, scrum ceremonies, product impact and so on.

June 2019 - Present

Software Engineer

Comprando en Grupo

Comprando en Grupo is an Statup where I have worked with python and django, making features to improve the MVP, automate logistic and administrative tasks and split the backend to frontend.

Projects

Split the system

Splitting frontend and backend using Angular and DRF as a first step to become the backend from a monolith to microservices.

Consolidation Invoice

Automate the creation of consolidation invoice which takes previous invoices, local taxes, logistic information, current exchange rate and exchange rate of previous invoices in order to customers present this invoice to government finance.

April 2017 - May 2019

Software Engineer

Extrados Software

Extrados Software is a software factory where I have worked with well-known brands of Argentina such as Arcor and Almundo developing and migrating customer service system. I had to deal with clients to develop the new system.

Projects

Arcor customer service

Migrating the legacy customer service to a new customer service system keeping all the functionalities and data also adding some news features such as Facebook plugin.

Almundo customer service

Creating a customer service from zero, defining with the client what functionalities they expected and the priority level of each one.

November 2015 - March 2017

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
